title: Ep - 104 - HANNAH FERRIER BELOW DECK
description:
Hannah Ferrier from Below Deck Med discusses the show's explosive new season, a typical day on a yacht, and what celebrities and bravolebrities she would love to have as charter guests. 


Pete and Katrina live in Chicago and love the show House Hunters on HGTV. Pete explains a helpful drinking game while watching episodes and the reason he believes most participants are lying about their budgets. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey 

http://www.loveandknuckles.com
